dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 105 IH: Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garrett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the mandate that individuals purchase health insurance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act.

section.header: Repeal of individual health insurance mandate
section.text: Section 5000A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as added by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: This section shall not apply with respect to any month beginning after the date of the enactment of this subsection.
